text: BLACKPINK Lisa's solo comeback ROCKSTAR broke 100M views in 3 days. The choreography with the car scene is iconic. Thai BLINKs organized a massive streaming party. The song samples a classic hip-hop beat. Already #1 on Spotify Global and Melon. Album pre-orders at 2M copies.
author: kpop_stan_lisa

text: Genshin Impact 5.2 update added Mavuika as playable pyro character. Her elemental burst does insane AoE damage. C0 is viable for F2P players. The new Natlan region has beautiful open world design. Spent $50 on the weapon banner though. #genshinimpact #mavuika
author: gacha_gamer
